attributes.action: Make Social Services Management Accountable For Their Decisions and Have a Complete Review of All Procedures Regarding Child Abuse Cases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make Social Services Management Accountable For Their Decisions and Have a Complete Review of All Procedures Regarding Child Abuse Cases.

After the case of baby P we are asking that Social services review their procedures and take responsibility for the decisions they make.
